summary: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.
cast: Paul Hubschmid|Paula Raymond|Cecil Kellaway|Kenneth Tobey|Donald Woods|Lee Van Cleef|Steve Brodie|Ross Elliott|Jack Pennick|Ray Hyke|Paula Hill|Michael Fox|Alvin Greenman|Frank Ferguson|King Donovan|Fred Aldrich|Gertrude Astor|James Best|Edward Clark|Louise Colombet|Robert Easton|Roy Engel|Franklyn Farnum|Bess Flowers|Don Gordon|Joe Gray|Merv Griffin|Kenner G. Kemp|Ann Kunde|Jimmy Lloyd|Vivian Mason|Vera Miles|Steve Mitchell|Lawrence Montaigne|Leo Mostovoy|Gil Perkins|Lee Phelps|Paul Picerni|Hugh Prosser|William Woodson
title: El monstruo de tiempos remotos
